document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Who </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">has </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">not </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#6cffa8">found </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e0bcd4">heaven </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">below, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Will </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#eca078">fail </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">it </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">above. </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#eca078">God's </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#bce454">residence </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">is </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">next </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">mine, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">His </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#bce454">furniture </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">is </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#eca078">love. </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: Who has not found the heaven below
